# Parser.Create&lt;T&gt; method

Creates a parser from a delegate.

```csharp
public static IParser<T> Create<T>(Func<TextPosition, IParseResult<T>> parse)
```

## Remarks

For maximum performance, derive from [`Parser`](../Parser-1.md).
